title: Michelle Obama & the DNC | Guests: Bjorn Lomborg & Steven Crowder | 8/18/20
description:
The first night of the Democratic National Convention was geared toward people who don’t know what’s going on in the world, and Michelle Obama’s speech is a perfect example. Where is the media to fact-check all these lies? BlazeTV’s Steven Crowder has been remonetized on YouTube and joins to discuss his interview with David Dorn’s widow. “False Alarm” author Bjorn Lomborg explains why climate change alarmism costs trillions, harms the poor, and doesn’t accomplish much. Is there anything that Michelle Obama said last night that conservatives can agree on? Richard Ross, whose family was refused entry to Disney World because his disabled daughter can’t wear a mask, joins to tell the story.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
